title: Irrésistible
overview: Adèle, creator of a successful podcast, has a mutual love at first sight of Arthur, a mathematician. But as soon as she is in his presence, she is prone to violent panic attacks. She is so capsized that she risks discomfort. There is no doubt about the diagnosis: Adele has post-traumatic stress disorder, a direct consequence of her previous love story, painfully ended. Adèle then has no choice but to stay away from Arthur. But the attraction is too strong...
